name: Tarō Shōji
description: {{nihongo|'''Tarō Shōji '''|東海林 太郎|Shōji Tarō|extra=December 11, 1898 – October 4, 1972|lead=yes}} was a popular Japanese [[ryūkōka]] singer. He also used the aliases {{nihongo|'''Shōji Shirō'''|庄司史郎}}, {{nihongo|'''Asabuki Kaoru'''|朝吹薫}}, and {{nihongo|'''Fujiwara Hideo'''|藤原英夫}} in his early recording career.
